title: 2 BR in Coney Island, Brooklyn. No fee, Beautiful, Safe $2,000
posting_body: ['Nice 2 Bedroom apt in Coney island Brooklyn, Just renovated.', 'Living room, Kitchen, Bath room, Dining.', 'All rooms have big windows, bedroom windows got back yard view.', '1st FL Apt.', 'Heat, and hot/cold water are included in the rent.', 'Utilities are not included.', 'Credit score 720/ Income $80K. 2 Bedroom apt is available for rent in Coney Island, Brooklyn.', 'Apt is just 2 blocks from Coney Island beach and boardwalk.', 'Near all shopping areas.', '24 hr.', 'ample street parking available.', 'The nearest train stop is Stillwell Ave(N, F, D, Q), 5 min bus ride from home.', 'Dollar cabs are available 24 hr.', 'Please leave msg for viewing.', 'Thanks.', 'No pets.']
